description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains sBTC-Crv (sBTC, WBTC, and renBTC) and tBTC, an ERC-20 supply-pegged to native BTC and overcollateralized with ETH.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. Los titulares obtienen tarifas de los usuarios que comercian en el grupo y también pueden depositar el LP en los gauges de Curve para obtener emisiones de CRV. Este metapool contiene sBTC-Crv (sBTC, WBTC y renBTC) y tBTC, un suministro ERC-20 vinculado a BTC nativo y sobregarantizado con ETH.

zh.description: 此代币是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含 sBTC-Crv (sBTC, WBTC, renBTC) 和 tBTC，tBTC 是以 ETH 作为超额抵押品铸造的 ERC-20 代币，价格锚定 BTC。
